title: TFT injectors
body:
What injectors are people using for TFT?
Because;
Crystal not lowering damage
Fully built items on every champ by barely 3rd round?
Multiple 3*s  by round 4 (And not just the cheap 1-2 costers)
Preds triggering ABOVE 20%?
Max gold by round 4?

I just wanna make the damage injections, item injections, and champ injections fair. Because if you unironically believe that is balanced, you should be perma banned just because you obviously are one of these people.
